name: Inventive AI
headline: GenAI-First RFP & Sales Questionnaire Response Platform
description:
Inventive is an AI-powered RFP & questionnaire response management platform that drives 70%+ efficiency in sales response workflows.

**Core benefits and features:**

- **10X Faster Drafts With Highly Accurate Responses**: Using Inventive’s proprietary AI-system you can get first drafts 10 times faster, with accurate responses rooted in your knowledge sources, that you and your team can collaborate on to refine.
- **Single Hub for All Your Knowledge Sources:** Inventive offers a centralized hub for all your knowledge sources. You can upload previous RFPs and relevant documents; integrate with your internal data systems such as gDrive. Sharepoint & more; upload Q&A from legacy tools or spreadsheets; and even add information from your websites.
- **Fight Stale Content With AI Content Manager:** Inventive’s AI content manager proactively flags conflicting content by identifying issues within your sources, so you only use fresh and relevant content in your responses.
- **Higher Productivity & Competitive Advantage With AI Agents:** Inventive offers a suite of AI agents designed to boost productivity and give you a competitive advantage. These agents can help with researching competitors, brainstorming ideas, and more.

Built by a customer-obsessed team comprising an ex-exec from a Fortune 500 company and ex-AI team from Google & Stanford. Backed by top Silicon Valley investors including YCombinator.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Dhiren Bhatia, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO at Inventive AI. Most recently, Founder & CEO at Viewics (acquired by Roche) - a SaaS analytics platform and suite of applications for health systems and clinical laboratories. MBA (UC Berkeley) | MS (Texas A&M University) | BE (University of Mumbai)

founders.name: Vishakh Hegde, Founder
founders.description: I previously led ML efforts at Ambient AI (yc17 / a16z). Studied ML and AI at Stanford. Went to IIT Madras for undergrad. I've published papers in ML/AI and have also authored a book deep learning (link: https://a.co/d/07ZnJwZ). Always looking to solve *real* problems. Love tinkering with technology.

founders.name: Gaurav Nemade, Founder
founders.description: Previously, Product Manager at Google AI & Google Brain and the first PM on Google's LLM platform - LaMDA that powered Google Bard. Studied CS from IIT Roorkee.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Inventive AI**

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Mountain View, CA  
**Team:** 5 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S23  
**Group Partner:** Nicolas Dessaigne  

**Website:** [inventive.ai](https://www.inventive.ai)  
**Tags:** generative-ai, saas, b2b, sales, ai, san-francisco-bay-area

### Mission
Inventive AI is on a mission to redefine how organizations manage RFPs (Requests for Proposals) and sales questionnaires. With a GenAI-first approach, their platform aims to improve response efficiency by more than 70%—something that translates into significant time and cost savings for businesses.

### Core Benefits & Features
1. **Speedy Drafts and Accuracy:** Imagine creating first drafts ten times faster than before. Inventive’s proprietary AI helps teams navigate through responses with lightning-fast precision, drawing from established knowledge bases.

2. **Centralized Knowledge Hub:** This isn't just any platform. It acts as a unified hub where your previous RFPs, documents, and data can be integrated seamlessly—whether that's from Google Drive, SharePoint, or legacy systems. Everything you need is in one place.

3. **AI Content Management:** Gone are the days of using outdated or conflicting information. Their AI content manager actively scans your content pool to flag inconsistencies, ensuring you utilize only the most relevant and fresh material.

4. **AI Agents for a Competitive Edge:** Inventive includes a suite of AI agents that help boost team productivity. From competitor analysis to idea generation, these tools empower sales teams to focus on winning rather than worrying about logistics.

### The Team
Crafted by a customer-centric team with experience at Fortune 500 companies, Google, and Stanford—Inventive is built on solid foundations. Their focus on customer need is echoed by their backing from prominent Silicon Valley investors, including Y Combinator, emphasizing trustworthiness and potential.

### Notable Integrations
Inventive AI makes it easy to connect with your existing stack, offering compatibility with tools like Jira, Notion, Confluence, Google Drive, Slack, and Salesforce. This ensures a smooth transition into your day-to-day workflows.

### Why Inventive AI?
In a world crowded with traditional RFP tools, Inventive AI stands out due to its emphasis on automation and contextual accuracy. The AI adapts to your historical data, ensuring that not just any response is crafted, but one that's finely attuned to your industry's vernacular and compliance demands.

Whether you're a small startup or a large enterprise, Inventive AI is designed to streamline the RFP process, foster collaboration, and enhance overall productivity.

If this sounds like a tool you'd like to explore further, their [demo page](https://www.inventive.ai/demo) is the next stop. Check it out—your future workflow might just thank you!
